Description: This corpus contains political, religious and scientific texts from the 16th to the 18th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-D repository.
This corpus contains Latin charters created in the era of John the Bling, King of Bohemia.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from LINDAT.

Corpus: Anthology of Middle English texts / Santiago Gonzalez y Fernandez-Corugedo
Description: This corpus contains literary texts from 1100 to 1400.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Dictionary of Old English Corpus in Electronic Form (DOEC)
Description: This corpus contains 3037 texts from 600 to 1150.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: The York-Toronto-Helsinki Parsed Corpus of Old English prose (YCOE)
Description: This corpus contains fictional texts from 600 to 1150.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Hamburg Corpus of Old Swedish with Syntactic Annotations (HaCOSSA)
Language: English, German, Latin, Old Norse, Swedish
Description: This corpus contains texts written in the Late Old Swedish period (from 1375 to 1550).#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of the University of Hamburg.

Corpus: The Electronic Text Corpus of Sumerian Literature. Revised edition.
Annotation: Each word form in the composite transliterations has been assigned to a lexeme which is specified by a citation form, word class information and basic English translation.
Description: This corpus contains transliterations and English translations of 394 Sumerian compositions from approximately 2100 to 1700 BCE.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Language: Finnish, Karelian, Ludian, Latin, Swedish, Olonets, Izhorian, Votic
Description: This corpus contains poems from 1564 to 1939.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: Corpus of Early Modern Finnish, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1809 to 1899.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.
This corpus contains the works by Finnish author Aleksis Kivi from 1855 to 1871.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: Classics Library of the National Library of Finland - Kielipankki version
Description: This corpus will contain literary texts from 1549 to 1944.

Corpus: The Letters of Paul Sinebrychoff, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains letters from 1895 to 1909.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated online search environment.

Corpus: The Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles from 1770 to 2011.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: The Newspaper and Periodical OCR Corpus of the National Library of Finland (1771-1874)
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles from 1771 to 1874.

Corpus: The Newspaper and Periodical OCR Corpus of the National Library of Finland (1875-1920)
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles from 1875 to 1920.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Language Bank of Finland.

Corpus: B4 Tatian Corpus of Deviating Examples 2.1
Description: This corpus contains the OHG Tatian, which is one of the largest prose texts from the Old High German period.#SEPThe corpus is available for download and through a concordancer from the repository of the University of Hamburg.

Annotation: tokenised, PoS-tagged, lemmatised, syntactically parsed, word sense (for materials more recent than 1800)
Description: This collection of corpora contains – among others – diachronic legal texts, Bible translations, medieval letters, digitized newspapers from the Swedish National Library and 19th century fiction from the Swedish Literature Bank.#SEPThe corpora are available through the concordancer Korp.
